entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
